alert.note: Alert for Phillips; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 15 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Smith and east central Phillips Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 629 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Kensington, or 14 miles east of Phillipsburg, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Kensington around 640 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Athol. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
